description: Main entry point for a Flutter mobile application, setting up the app's material design theme and home page widget.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting up the Material app theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home page of the app, displaying a message and a loading indicator.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage, building the UI with an AppBar and centered content.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, initiates running of the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and _MyHomePageState.
